t: Ocado Creates a Seamless Voice Shopping Experience through Rigorous Testing and Customer Focus
s: Ocado is the world's largest online-only supermarket and a popular brand among British consumers. When Amazon Echo and Alexa launched in the UK, Ocado saw the opportunity to reach their customers in new ways.
